name: Healthyfied Soy Free Beef Steak
description: Indulge in a high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar delight with our Healthyfied Soy Free Beef Steak. Perfect for those seeking nutritious yet delicious healthy recipes, this dish promises to be a flavorful journey into health-conscious dining.

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the 60g of white onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the 300 grams of lean beef evenly with 0.25 teaspoon of salt, 0.25 teaspoon of ground pepper, and 1 teaspoon of Spice World.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Let the seasoned beef sit for 10 minutes to absorb the flavors.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a grill or skillet over medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the beef for 4-5 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or until desired doneness.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the beef from the heat and let it rest for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot, garnished with the sliced white onions.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
